closeWarning.title: Are you sure you want to close the launcher?
closeWarning.desc: If an installation is in progress, you could leave it incomplete or corrupted.
faq-1.question: Why was Spore NEXT created, and what is its long-term future?
faq-1.answer: Spore NEXT was born out of my love for Spore, one of the first PC games I ever played as a child. As I began studying programming, I decided to create this mod manager as part of that journey. I plan to keep Spore NEXT updated for a long time and potentially expand it to support other games as well. The project is still in an early stage, and I don't currently have a lot of time or resources to update it consistently, but I do my best to maintain and improve it. I also have several ideas I'd like to implement in the future, such as building a dedicated Sporepedia, improving integration and communication with the Spore NEXT website, and providing modders with tools to upload their own mods directly to the launcher.
faq-2.question: Why is the project called Spore NEXT?
faq-2.answer: I've always been a big fan of No Man's Sky. By now, we all know how the game was at launch… however, the "NEXT" update marked the turning point where the game truly came back to life. In that sense, the name can be seen as a small Easter egg or tribute.
faq-3.question: What are the requirements to use Spore NEXT Mod Manager?
faq-3.answer: Windows 10 or later, and a working installation of Spore: Galactic Adventures. We don't support the base Spore version or pirated copies of the game.
faq-4.question: What is the role of Spore ModAPI in the project, and how is it related to Spore NEXT?
faq-4.answer: Spore ModAPI is responsible for handling the installation, uninstallation, and loading of mods for Spore. Spore NEXT, on the other hand, is a mod manager designed to make downloading and maintaining mods easier, while also improving the overall user experience. They are two separate projects that communicate with each other. If you have questions or run into issues specifically related to Spore ModAPI, please join its Discord community for support.
faq-5.question: Can I be banned for using Spore NEXT or Spore ModAPI?
faq-5.answer: Absolutely not. EA/Maxis has never implemented an anti-cheat system or punishment policies for modding.
faq-6.question: Is it recommended to have multiple copies of the game installed?
faq-6.answer: No. Installing multiple copies of the game is known to cause a wide variety of issues. Try to avoid installing the game on different platforms at the same time—for example, installing it via EA if you already have it on Steam, or via GOG if you already have it on EA.
faq-7.question: What's a Galaxy Reset?
faq-7.answer: A galaxy reset is required because all campaign games take place within a single shared galaxy. When certain mods modify core galaxy elements, the changes can only be applied by resetting the entire galaxy. As a result, all existing save games will be lost. When installing a mod that requires a galaxy reset, the Easy Installer will notify you beforehand. The reset is not performed automatically, so you have the opportunity to create a backup of your files if needed before proceeding. To perform a galaxy reset, you can use the built-in option available in the launcher's Mod List to do it quickly. Alternatively, you can follow this guide to reset the galaxy manually.
faq-8.question: Spore does not start or crashes on launch
faq-8.answer: A clean installation of the game fixes the vast majority of issues. We also recommend uninstalling all installed mods (both those listed in Spore NEXT and any custom mods installed using Spore ModAPI). You can also check a guide covering the most common errors at the following link.
faq-9.question: How do I get support or report bugs?
faq-9.answer: You can reach out via Discord or open an issue on GitHub.
modlist-sort-endorsements-desc: Sorted by rating (high → low). Click to sort low → high.
modlist-sort-endorsements-asc: Sorted by rating (low → high). Click to reset sorting.
settingspanel-language-subtitle: Choose the language you want Spore NEXT to display.
settingspanel-disclaimer-1: SPORE NEXT is developed and maintained by Franz. For support or inquiries, please reach out via Discord. The source code is available on GitHub and distributed under the MIT License.
settingspanel-disclaimer-2: All mods are maintained by their respective authors. While most have been reviewed for quality and safety, users should exercise caution when installing unfamiliar mods.
settingspanel-disclaimer-3: SPORE NEXT is not affiliated with, sponsored, or endorsed by Electronic Arts, Maxis or the Spore ModAPI team. Spore ModAPI is used solely as a third-party tool to facilitate the installation and uninstallation of mods. This launcher and all included or referenced mods are unofficial and not supported by EA or Maxis.
modapi-modal-found-desc: Spore ModAPI seems to be already installed on your PC. The launcher will use the detected installation path.
modapi-modal-install-desc: Spore ModAPI is required. Click the button below to install the Spore ModAPI Launcher Kit.
galaxyreset-title: Galaxy Reset: backup and reset your Spore galaxy
galaxyreset-confirm: This will reset your Spore galaxy by backing up %AppData%\Roaming\Spore\Games. Continue?
galaxyreset-success: Galaxy reset complete. Backup created at:
galaxyreset-modal-success-title: You have successfully restarted your galaxy
galaxyreset-confirm-details: The folder "Games" will be renamed to "Games.backup" (or "Games.backup1", "Games.backup2", etc.).
galaxyreset-missing-games: To reset the galaxy, you must start Spore at least once so it can recreate the Games folder.
launcherupdate-modal-desc: A new version of the launcher is available.
launcherupdate-modal-restart: If you continue, the launcher will download the update and restart to apply it.
